title: autoupdate 4.5.7 -> 5.0.3 class 'oc_util' and class 'oc_filestorage_common' not found
body:
using autoupdater, after refreshing i receive http 500. errorlog produces:

    2013/04/11 13:58:20 [error] 19085#0: *3 fastcgi sent in stderr: "php message: php fatal error:  class 'oc_util' not found in /var/www/thomas-steinbrenner.net/owncloud/settings/admin.php on line 8" while reading response header from upstream, client: 78.142.125.224, server: owncloud.thomas-steinbrenner.net, request: "get /settings/admin.php http/1.1", upstream: "fastcgi://unix:/var/run/php5-fpm.sock:", host: "owncloud.thomas-steinbrenner.net", referrer: "https://owncloud.thomas-steinbrenner.net"
    2013/04/11 13:58:20 [error] 19085#0: *3 open() "/var/www/thomas-steinbrenner.net/owncloud/favicon.ico" failed (2: no such file or directory), client: 78.142.125.224, server: owncloud.thomas-steinbrenner.net, request: "get /favicon.ico http/1.1", host: "owncloud.thomas-steinbrenner.net"
    2013/04/11 13:58:32 [error] 19085#0: *21 fastcgi sent in stderr: "php message: php fatal error:  class 'oc_filestorage_common' not found in /var/www/thomas-steinbrenner.net/owncloud/apps/files_archive/lib/storage.php on line 9" while reading response header from upstream, client: 78.142.125.224, server: owncloud.thomas-steinbrenner.net, request: "propfind /remote.php/webdav/roamingdata http/1.1", upstream: "fastcgi://unix:/var/run/php5-fpm.sock:", host: "owncloud.thomas-steinbrenner.net"

debian wheezy, nginx, php5-fpm and https://github.com/owncloud/documentation/issues/56#issuecomment-16020376
